title.narrative: F.a: Supporting Malawi National Association of the Deaf Organizational, Advocacy and Sign Language Work Capacities

description.narrative: WHAT: Capacity building of the partner organisation and support to their advocacy work continue to be at the core of the project. Based on a study made in 2016 it was concluded that MANAD is now ready to start developing the sign language of Malawi. This i s a new component in the cooperation. HOW: With the help of deaf advisors and in close cooperation with relevant stakeholders the development will be started. WHY: Developing of a national sign language is an essential component paving way for developing q uality education for the deaf as well as sign language interpreter trainings. These in their part pave way for the inclusion of the deaf in the society. PARTNER ORGANISATION: Malawi National Association of the Deaf MANAD.
